name: Grilled Eggplant, Onion, and Red Pepper Sandwich
author: Marcia
summary: This quick and easy grilled eggplant sandwich is a healthy substitute for a burger, and it tastes great! I cooked the eggplant and other veggies in a grill press to save time, but you could also use a grill pan or barbecue grill to prepare them.
ingredients: 1  purple eggplant, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch slices
1  sweet red bell pepper, broadly sliced
directions: Spray 1 side of each eggplant slice with cooking spray
Turn slices over and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese, black pepper, and oregano, then spray with cooking spray
Place eggplant slices in the panini press and close the lid
Add 2 slices of onion and 4 pieces of red bell pepper to the panini press and close the lid
Meanwhile, toast sandwich rolls and place on individual serving plates
Place 1 slice of provolone on the bottom half of each roll, then add grilled eggplant, onion, and bell pepper slices
Cover each with top half of the roll and enjoy
